thread.section_title: Merritt Wellness Center Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merritt Wellness Center | merrittwellness.com
thread.title: Jim
thread.title_full: Merritt Wellness Center reviewed by Jim

author: Jim
title: Jim
text: Several years ago Merritt Wellness provided supplements, acupuncture and a diet plan to counter allergic reactions. It took about three months but it worked. I have not suffered from allergies since. I just completed a one hour consult with Dr Marlene during which she answered all my questions regarding the nutrition plan I am currently using. I have never had a more clear, simple explanation of how blood sugar works and the benefits of a low carb diet. I plan to continue using Merritt Wellness for all my wellness needs.
